post_text: On Tuesday, November 12, 2019, Mr. David Sterner took 7 students to Bloomsburg University to 22nd annual math competition. Team 1 members were Noah Fredericks, Christian Honicker, Caleb Reedy, and James Schaeffer. Team 2 members were sophomores Julia Balulis, Kaylee Becker, and Ayva Strauss. There are 3 different portions to the competition: Quiz bowl format, Brain Teasers upon which the team works together to answer written questions, and the 24 game. Team 1 placed 3rd in Brain Teasers, and Team 2 got knocked out in the quarterfinals of the 24 game. Both teams performed admirably, and it was an enriching experience for each of the 7 students involved.
